From the brand

Tenmiro Led Lights

Dedicated to providing personalized and fun life experiences

Tenmiro committed to bringing colorful visual effects and unique home experience to families. Here, you can get RGB lights whose colors can beswitched at will , strip lights that guide the visual magic and dynamic sparkling lights. Tenmiro not only bring your home even life infinite daydream space, but also shock vitality. Come to Tenmiro, come to colorful home and life.

More Size

MULTIFUNCTIONAL LIGHT STRIPS: You can adjust the light strips brightness from 1% to 100% to suit the various places. LED strip lights have memory function. By the smart App, you can experience the timing function, 28 Dynamic modes, you can also DIY your unique color
EASY TO INSTALL: Fully equipped accessories, it comes with 50ft Led light strip, power adapter, Ir remote control, controller and instruction manual, no need for any other devices, simply stick the strip lights on clean, dry surface. start to enjoy strip lighting
MULTIPLE SCENES AVAILABLE: 50ft Led strip lights long enough, suitable for home decor, it can be used for decorating your bedroom, dining room, living room, kitchen, porch, cabinet, Christmas tree, bar. especially great for Holiday event decoration like Christmas, Halloween, party, birthday, new year, and more

TENMIRO Smart LED strip Lights

Humanized design.Intelligent APP offers you more joy.Vibrant, bright Led strip lights meet your need for colorful home decoration. Just a simple action, you can set these color changing lights according to your preference.

The LED strips are ideal for bedroom, kitchen, under cabinets, living rooms, TV backlighting, garden, balconies, patios, parties, holidays, or family events.

You can use virtually anywhere you want!

Led light color will change with the rhythm of the sound and music, dance with the strip lights！！

Color changing lights bring more fun to your party

Lights for bedroom can auto open/close at set time

LED light with easy adjustment of color and brightness

#1 in Kinesiology Recovery Tapes

Price: $10.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:43:28 UTC – Details)


KT Tape is lightweight, comfortable to wear and can be used for many common injuries from neck and shoulder strains and pains all the way down to shin splints, Achilles tendonitis and nearly every injury that can affect muscles, joints and tendons in-between. KT Tape Classic is a cotton and elastic sports tape that relieves pain while supporting muscles, tendons and ligaments. When applied correctly, KT Tape reduces pressure to tissue which reduces discomfort and pain. That’s why KT Tape is used by and relied upon by professional athletes, athletic trainers and medical professionals. KT Tape is also used heavily in the Olympics by team USA. Sized at 2″ X 16′, This roll of KT Tape is designed to be cut into strips for customized care and a personalized fit. Making the classic Even more athlete friendly is that the acrylic based medical grade adhesive is gentle on skin, Unlike traditional athletic tape. This is one roll sized 2″ X 16′ Of Beige colored KT Tape Classic. In addition to pain relief, taping provides support to muscles by helping them to not over-extend or over-contract. KT Tape has more than 60 instructional videos available online teaching how to correctly apply the tape to support various body parts and to help with various injuries. The elastic core delivers strong support for muscles, joints and tendons without restricting comfort and range of motion. This means it will provide stronger support, for as long as you need it, remaining comfortable for up to 3 days. So durable, KT Tape will stay on in water be it the shower, The pool or the ocean. For best results, apply KT Tape One hour before activity and after you’ve first cleaned the skin of dirt and oils. Don’t overstretch the tape and make sure the ends are on skin, not on tape.
WHAT IS KT TAPE? – Elastic sports tape used by pro and serious athletes to support muscles, joints, tendons, and ligaments. It’s drug-free, latex-free, hypoallergenic, lightweight, breathable, comfortable, HSA/FSA approved, and easy to use.
HOW DOES IT WORK? – It helps reduce tissue pressure and support muscles and joints. Studies show it helps you recover faster from pain. Used for knee pain, shoulder pain, shin splints, back pain, plantar fasciitis, tennis elbow, and much more.
EASY TO USE – Easy to self-apply using our free application videos (see our site) for common injury areas.  Our Taping Basics video teaches you how to help the tape stick properly, and our 60+ videos help you apply it for your area of pain.
TRUSTED BY PROFESSIONALS – Relied on by professional and Olympic athletes, athletic trainers, and medical professionals to train longer and finish stronger. Used heavily by Team USA, NBA Trainers Association, US Soccer, USA Triathlon, and more.
KT Tape products are Hypoallergenic, Latex-Free, Natural Rubber-Free! This means that our products have been designed and developed to contain fewer potential substances that can trigger allergic reactions

item.title: Fagomfer Kwumsy D1 PRO Real-time Ambient TV LED Backlight Kit with HDMI 2.0 Sync Box, Immersion Ambient Lighting Strips for 75-90 Inch TV, 15 Lighting Modes/4 HDMI Inputs/Handy Remote Control
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) ⭐Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $209.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:34 UTC – Details)



Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no video format restrictions, supports resolution 4K 60HZ (3860*2140P) input and output, Dolby DTS and other audio output.
Unmatched Color Accuracy: The D1 PRO uses an FPGA-based controller board and applies it to a light bar with ARGB LEDs, each light strip contains 60 ARGB LED beads per meter, ensuring it delivers vivid color reproduction every time. Through advanced AI programming, each LED light bead is intelligently controlled to provide stable, accurate, vivid and zero-lag color effects, which will provide extra light to the room while reducing eye strain when viewing in low light conditions pressure.
Personalization: D1 PRO has 15 light modes to immerse you in a visual wonderland and explore the infinite possibilities of lighting. It also comes with an easy-to-use remote, so you can change the color or brightness of the light whenever you want, depending on your mood or need, providing exciting lighting effects for music, videos and games.
Friendly Design and Easy to Use: We offer different sizes to match any screen from 32 inches to 120 inches, please buy as you need. At the same time, our LED light bar has a protective layer, which can be cut to the length you need along the dotted line according to your personal needs. All you need to do is plug the cable into the HDMI signal box and attach the strip to the back of the TV/Monitor screen to use (we come with the part to attach the LED strip).

(as of Nov 29,2022 10:17:50 UTC – Details)


Pin Boards for Walls

Detail Specifications
● Safe and odourless.
● Clean and clutter-free edges.
● Keep things handy, Pretty Decoration.

Package Content
● 4 Piece of pin boards for walls.
● 40 candy-colored push pins for daily use.
If you want to bring a pop of color and dimension to your home without changing too much, or cover up imperfections in an accessible fashion, you can not miss this small bulletin board set.
Choose different push pin board strips for several spots while blending into your decor. More possibilities than a traditional cork board. A good way to leave your messages, display your collections, pictures and impress everyone who comes to visit it!
Pin reminders, notes in a variety of places so you won’t miss any important dates, tasks. The 13”×2”×0.35” cute bulletin board allows you to make full use of small space. Like the door, closet, refrigerator, bookcase, mirror, etc.
Easy to remove the mini bulletin board without ruining your walls. Perfect for a rental property or public place like classroom, office, dorm room, apartment complex.
Coming 4 bulletin board strips and 40 push pins in one package. The length of the needle is shorter than the thickness of felt strip, won’t protrude from the wall. Not recommended on textured walls.
